participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Curious and enthusiastic, Liam enjoys engaging in deep conversations and shares a passion for literature.
participant_1.background: I am a vegetarian. I take the subway to work everyday. Every fall I visit my sister in Canada. I have four cats.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Intellectual and introspective, Sophia is an avid reader who appreciates the thrill of a good story and values family and personal growth.
participant_2.background: My favorite subject in school was science. My mom is a cancer survivor. My favorite hobby is reading suspense novels. Pizza is my favorite food. I am single and not looking.

content.text: What's up?
Not much, just reading a suspense novel.
Oh, that sounds fun. What's it about?
It's about a serial killer who is targeting single women.
Oh, that sounds scary.
It is a little bit, but it's also really good.
Do you like to read suspense novels often?
Yeah, I'm a big fan of the genre.
Me too! I love the way suspense novels keep me guessing until the end.
Me too! I also love the way they make me feel like I'm part of the story.
I know what you mean. I feel like I'm right there with the characters, trying to figure out what's going to happen next.
That's exactly it!
What's your favorite suspense novel of all time?
That's a tough one, but I think I'd have to say The Silence of the Lambs.
Oh, that's a great one! I love that book.
Me too! It's so suspenseful and the characters are so well-developed.
I agree. It's definitely one of my favorites too.
Have you read any other books by Thomas Harris?
Yeah, I've read Red Dragon and Hannibal.
Oh, those are both great books too.
I agree! I'm a big fan of Thomas Harris's work.
Me too! He's one of my favorite authors.
